metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1257 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Pidgin 2.10.0 uses DBUS for certain cleartext communication, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information via a dbus session monitor.

notes.Note: sbeattie> libpurple exposes private comms over local session dbus. This is a legitimate issue for desktop application isolation

criterions.comment: pidgin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
